text:
On n&w s5; I'm building relook

"website that help ppl connect w e-waste facility near them"

simple, you head to relook

find nearby e-waste management facility, enter details

schedule pickup or drop off

and get rewarded.

DONT SHY AWAY; DO SHARE THOUGHT?
